Package org.apache.avro.reflect

Class ReflectData.AllowNull

java.lang.Object
org.apache.avro.generic.GenericData
org.apache.avro.specific.SpecificData
org.apache.avro.reflect.ReflectData
org.apache.avro.reflect.ReflectData.AllowNull
Enclosing class:
ReflectData
public static class ReflectData.AllowNull extends ReflectData
ReflectData implementation that permits null field values. The schema generated for each field is a union of its declared type and null.
